hover-to-view-info: Наведите, чтобы просмотреть информацию об этом значке!

whoops.name: Упс!
whoops.description: Получите убийство путем скидывания игрока в лаву

early_bird_gets_the_worm.name: Ранняя пташка получает червяка
early_bird_gets_the_worm.description: Будьте первый игроком, кто откроет сундук

aim_is_the_game.name: Цель – это игра
aim_is_the_game.description: С помощю эндер-жемчуга спаситесь от падаения в пустоту

practice_makes_perfect.name: Практика совершенствует
practice_makes_perfect.description: Убейте игрока стрелой на расстоянии 30 блоков

skywars_explorer.name: Исследователь
skywars_explorer.description: Сыиграйте на всех картах Skywars из текущей ротации

which_do_i_choose.name: Какой же мне выбрать?
which_do_i_choose.description: Выиграте игры в Skywars, используя 10 уникальных наборовs

peaceful_mode.name: Peaceful mode
peaceful_mode.description: Win a game without anyone on your team hitting anyone

voided.name: Voided
voided.description: Knock a player into the void with projectiles

forgot_my_parachute.name: Forgot my parachute
forgot_my_parachute.description: Kill a player by hitting them into the void

no_block_left_behind.name: No block left behind
no_block_left_behind.description: Collect 64 of the same block in your inventory in one game.

that_was_quick.name: That was quick
that_was_quick.description: Get a kill within the first 5 seconds of the walls dropping

no_blocks_no_problem.name: No blocks, no problem
no_blocks_no_problem.description: Win a game without breaking or placing blocks

professional_boxer.name: Professional boxer
professional_boxer.description: Kill a player with only your fist

unbiased_killer.name: Unbiased killer
unbiased_killer.description: Kill at least one player from every team in a game

hot_bath.name: Hot bath
hot_bath.description: Kill a player while swimming in lava

dead_eye.name: Dead eye
dead_eye.description: Get 4 kills with a bow in one game

what_map.name: What map?
what_map.description: Win a game after the entire map has been corrupted

micro_battles_clutch.name: Clutch
micro_battles_clutch.description: Win a game while being the last member of your team standing.

micro_battles_explorer.name: Explorer
micro_battles_explorer.description: Play on every Micro Battles map in a given rotation

speed_builders_explorer.name: Explorer
speed_builders_explorer.description: Play on every Speed Builders map in a given rotation
